programme.desc: Its Halloween in Elmore. As the kids go trick or treating we see what everyone in town is up to. The ghosts and ghouls are finding it increasingly difficult to scare children, and are only scaring part-time. Can Gumball and Darwin help them get their scare back?

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.desc: Gumballs old BFF, Fuzzy, turns up on his doorstep. Darwin struggles to accept that there was someone before him and fails to contain his jealousy. But is Darwin right to mistrust Fuzzy? Does Fuzzy actually have sinister motives for reconnecting with his old BFF?

programme.desc: Gumball and Darwins clothes go missing after a swimming lesson, and Gumball is forced to wear a tuxedo from the lost and found office. programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.desc: When everything goes wrong in Darwins life, he begins to suspect that Gumballs bad influence might be to blame. Darwin decides to go elsewhere for guidance and finds a new mentor in Alan. But maybe its time Darwin started making his own decisions.

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.desc: Gumball and Darwin realize that the adult residents of Elmore are dangerously naive when it comes to being safe online. In fact they are in serious need of the boys help with even the simplest of tasks. And no more so than their mom Nicole.

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.desc: Gumball is embarrassed when Mum comes to school to spend some "quality time".

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.desc: Darwin starts sneezing repeatedly and it seems he cant stop. The Wattersons figure maybe hes allergic to something. After a few guesses, they come to the conclusion that he is allergic to stupidity. Being surrounded by stupid people, this is something of a problem. And they need to find a solution before Darwins increasingly explosive sneezes destroy the town.

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.desc: Its Mothers Day, and Gumball and Darwin discover that Tobias and Banana Joe have both made a card for "The Best Mom in the World". Clearly Nicole Watterson is the Best Mom, but Tobias and BJ just wont admit it... So they organise a mom-off at the mall between Nicole, Banana Barbara and Jackie Wilson. Needless to say it gets pretty intense.

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.desc: Mom has forced Dad to install a password on the computer. The pop-up clue advises them that the password is the name of Dads favorite child. After trying "Gumball" and "Darwin" unsuccessfully, they discover the answer is, in fact, "Anais". They are determined to become Dads favourites by any means necessary, even if it means undermining each other, plotting against Anais or driving a wedge between mom and dad.

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.desc: Gumball and Darwin are offended when Mom calls them "procrastinators", once shes told them what it means. They promise to take the trash out by the time she gets home. As the clock slowly counts down, they discover that they will go to extraordinary lengths, no matter how inane, to avoid the task in hand.

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.desc: While performing a school play, Gumball is so nervous about kissing Penny that he accidentally headbutts her and cracks open her shell. They discover that under Pennys shell is an emotional shape-shifting inner self. Pennys father is determined for Penny to keep it hidden but Gumball encourages her to show the world who, or what, she really is.

programme.title: The Heroic Quest of the Valiant Prince Ivandoe Shorts
programme.sub-title: The Prince and the Plucky Duck
programme.desc: Ivandoe dismisses Bert and takes on a duck as his new Squire. The duck proves to be worse than useless when they come face to face with an angry tentacled forest creature. Ivandoe misses Bert and wants him back but is too proud to admit it…

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.desc: Principal Brown gives Gumball and Darwin the ancient school hamster, Chris Morris, to look after for the weekend. However they accidentally leave it at school, and take home a clump of Principal Browns hair instead. Surprisingly they discover it makes an excellent pet! When they realise they have left the real Chris Morris at school, they have to race to find him before their error is discovered.

programme.title: Total DramaRama
programme.desc: When a lack of motivation threatens to sink the kids chances in the Sportslete Athlaction Awards, they create the greatest mascot of all time to boost school spirit.

programme.title: Total DramaRama

programme.title: Total DramaRama
programme.desc: When an "evil congomerate" is threatening to takeover Chefs favorite childhood restaurant, Ownrallies the kids to take them down.

programme.title: Total DramaRama
programme.desc: Chef brings a souvenir iceberg home from a trip to the South Pole and Duncan finds a prehistoric surprise inside.

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.desc: The Wattersons are swapping scary stories on a family vacation, when their car breaks down in the middle of the desert. They are left with no alternative but to trust a complete stranger, whose appearance matches the scary guy in Moms story. When the stranger brings them to a derelict gas station, just as he did in moms made-up scary story, the Wattersons can no longer pretend the story isnt coming true.

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.desc: When Gumball and Darwin discover his diploma is fake, Principal Brown is determined to keep their discovery a secret. He offers them all sorts of "incentives" to keep quiet but the truth is they really dont care whether the diploma is real or not. Mistaking their disinterest as "playing hard to get" Principal Brown resorts to increasingly desperate measures to ensure Gumball and Darin play ball.

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.desc: Gumball and Darwin start noticing small details around Elmore High that dont add up. They come to the conclusion that Molly has disappeared, even though nobody else remembers her ever having existed. Mr Small confirms their suspicions and tells them that things are not always what they seem in Elmore. They set off on a quest to rescue Molly in an alternate dimension, and soon need rescuing themselves!

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.desc: After a health scare the kids decide to reunite Mr Robinson with his son. Mr Robinson has always seen Rocky as a disappointment so when Gumball and Darwin help him land a corporate job at Chanax, he is thrilled. However the Chanax corporation is not quite what it seems. Can Gumball and Darwin rescue Rocky before he becomes a corporate drone for all eternity?

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.desc: Clayton is a compulsive liar, but Gumball discovers he wasnt lying about his awesome martial arts move. Gumball confronts Clayton about his fabled Seven Pressure Point Heart Exploding Technique, assuming its another one of his outlandish claims. Darwin and Gumball intervene to help Clayton start embracing the truth. However, when they discover the move is as effective as he claimed, they really wish hed been lying.

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball

He soon proves that the tiniest offense can indeed snowball into complete lawlessness!

programme.title: Craig of the Creek

programme.title: Craig of the Creek

programme.title: Craig of the Creek

When Bobert starts applying his robot logic to their rules they realise they must be much clearer.

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.desc: Gumball is livid when an online test keeps telling him that his character-type is "The Loser". Hes convinced that the only way to shake off this label is to do the opposite of everything he normally would. But Gumball suppressing his natural instincts leaves a vacuum, a Gumball-shaped hole that someone has to fill. That someone is Tobias, who starts turning the whole show into a cliched sitcom.

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.desc: A chance encounter with the woman of his dreams inspires Rocky to stop living life online and find love with the help of the latest dating app. Gumball and Darwin try to help Rocky through the tricky world of online romance. In the race to find Rockys dream girl they discover that people can forgive almost anything when you tell them youre acting in the name of love.

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.desc: Gumball and Darwin give Bobert specific instructions to ensure he acts in a safe and responsible manner. When Bobert starts applying his robot logic to their rules, they soon realise theyre going to have to be much clearer. Or he will end up destroying them all...

programme.title: We Bare Bears
programme.desc: When Grizz, Panda, and Ice Bear catch the attention of the Department of Wildlife Control, their world turns upside down. Their quest to become the ultimate internet stars attracts the attention of a threat that could tear them apart and sends them on a quest far, far beyond the bear cave! The Bears are left with no choice but to go on the run. Leaving their home in San Francisco, they head towards a land where bears are more at home than anywhere else: Canada.

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.desc: Gumball and Darwin learn that it isnt wise to upset Hector, Elmores resident Giant.

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.desc: Nicole has decided its time to throw out the familys refrigerator. This doesnt go down too well with Richard as its his favorite possession. When it turns out the refrigerator is also a magical storage facility for childhood emotions and memories it makes sense that Richard is having a hard time letting go.

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball

programme.title: Lamput
programme.desc: Its Specs big date! He looks sharp. His beloved is enjoying herself. Lifes good. Things hit a snag when the annoying customer at the next table turns out to be Lamput. Specs comes face to face with some big questions of work-life-balance. Should he be a perfect gentleman and give his partner the attention she deserves? Or spend his evening in a desperate scramble to capture an orange blob? Turns out Lamputs feeling merciful, and helps Specs hoodwink -erm- "impress" his lady. One cant help but wonder how Specs girlfriend will feel once she discovers that that diamond ring shes wearing is actually a shapechanging fugitive from a biochem lab.

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.desc: When Darwin and Gumball reveal how theyd spend their perfect day, Gumball confesses that he would spend it with Penny. Darwin gets jealous and sets out to dig some dirt on Penny, hoping it will split them up. Meanwhile Gumball is planning to step his and Pennys relationship up a notch, by proposing marriage!

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.desc: Granny Jojo has brought a boyfriend to her birthday meal and Dad isnt happy about it. He bans Granny JoJo from ever seeing Louis again. When the kids get caught sneaking Granny Jojo out of the house, Dad challenges Louis to a man-off to prove once and for all who is the man of the house?!!

programme.title: Total DramaRama
programme.desc: When Chef discovers his spooky Halloween pranks have never scared the kids hes devastated. Determined to get them this year, he agrees to hand over full control of his pranking to Gwen. Her plan turns out far spookier then Chef ever hoped.

programme.title: Total DramaRama
programme.desc: When Chef discovers his spooky Halloween pranks have never scared the kids hes devastated. Determined to get them this year, he agrees to hand over full control of his pranking to Gwen. Her plan turns out far spookier then Chef ever hoped.

programme.title: Total DramaRama
programme.desc: The Bad Guy Busters must reunited to save Izzy after Harold uncovers her previous identity and leads a super villain from her past right to her.

programme.title: Total DramaRama
programme.desc: Chef forgets the password for his computer but knows it has something to do with one of the 99 previous explosions that took out the school. Entering the wrong password will cause the school to blow up for the 100th time.

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.desc: Darwin starts sneezing repeatedly and it seems he cant stop. The Wattersons figure maybe hes allergic to something. After a few guesses, they come to the conclusion that he is allergic to stupidity. Being surrounded by stupid people, this is something of a problem. And they need to find a solution before Darwins increasingly explosive sneezes destroy the town.

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.desc: Its Mothers Day, and Gumball and Darwin discover that Tobias and Banana Joe have both made a card for "The Best Mom in the World". Clearly Nicole Watterson is the Best Mom, but Tobias and BJ just wont admit it... So they organise a mom-off at the mall between Nicole, Banana Barbara and Jackie Wilson. Needless to say it gets pretty intense.

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: Mr Bean wins two tickets for an exotic cruise and naturally he takes Teddy along for the trip of a lifetime. Once aboard the huge ocean liner Mr Bean soon settles into a life of luxury but while showing off to a new friend Bean becomes "man overboard" and stranded on a dessert island. The hungrier he gets the wilder he becomes and desperate to find a way off the island.

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: Mr Bean goes to his favourite china shop to buy a new cup for Teddy but when he opens his wallet he doesnt have enough money to pay for it. When he sees a poster for the local funfair where the stalls have cash prizes Bean is determined to win himself some money on the Coconut Shy. But after many unsuccessful attempts he realises its a fix and lets everyone know about it. Naturally this doesnt go down well with the stallholder who wants revenge and a chase around the funfair ensues.

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: Mr Beans electricity supply is cut off when Mrs Wicket sees the cost of her enormous electricity bill. As the snow falls outside Mr Beans flat becomes so cold that there are ice cubes in his bath water. Mr Bean has the idea to build a huge wind turbine in the back garden providing his own power. All is going very well until an unexpected storm sends Beans wind turbine into overdrive creating a huge surge of electricity and a huge shock for everyone

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: Mr Bean goes to his local bakery to buy a cake but finds he doesnt have any money. He goes to the bank to use the cash machine but he cant remember his pin number. When Mr Beans bankcard is swallowed up by the cash machine theres only one thing to do - go into the machine and fetch it back. The police are alerted but Beans main concern is to get some money and get back to the bakers before all the cakes are sold.

programme.title: Grizzy ja lemmingud

programme.title: Grizzy ja lemmingud
programme.desc: When they discover a super fun app that allows you to see yourself as a rabbit or a robot or else decked out with lots of animated accessories, Grizzy and the Lemmings fight over the tablet. But if they insist on arguing and refuse to share their virtual costumes, they could end up smashing each others faces in for real.

programme.title: Grizzy ja lemmingud
programme.desc: When they find an old book on traditional Japanese origami, the Lemmings churn out paper birds to play gliding games. Grizzy realizes that he could make the gorgeous butterfly on the cover for his beloved she-bear. But to make the Lemmings bow to his authority, he will first have to become a true origami master.

programme.title: Grizzy ja lemmingud
programme.desc: The Lemmings are all lined up on the couch to watch a cartoon film where a mouse plays nasty tricks on a cat. Grizzy, who has decided to take his nap, switches off the TV and confiscates the batteries of the remote control to make sure they cant switch their program back on. But is it wise to frustrate a gang of Lemmings whove been inspired by a gag-filled cartoon?

programme.title: Grizzy ja lemmingud
programme.desc: Once again, Grizzy shows the Lemmings that they just dont measure up to him physically and that the last jar of chocolate spread is for the strongest. programme.title: Grizzy ja lemmingud
programme.sub-title: Never Judge a Bear by Its Cover
programme.desc: The Lemmings lay their hands on a full crate of chocolate spread, which they hide somewhere behind Grizzys back. And since the Lemmings are both prudent and cunning, its impossible to surprise them when they pay a visit to their secret hoard. Until the day Grizzy discovers a magic ring that enables him to take on the appearance of a Lemming.

programme.title: Grizzy ja lemmingud
programme.desc: Grizzy is persuaded that hes discovered the ultimate gadget for good living: a pair of connected glasses for watching TV in panoramic view, with all sorts of indicators, namely an intrusion warning signal. programme.title: Grizzy ja lemmingud
programme.desc: The Lemmings clamor for their turn to play with the rangers mobile phone, but Grizzy isnt in the sharing mood. programme.title: Mr Bean

programme.title: Dorothy and the Wizard of Oz

Jack loves the new look and even gets a girl in the process. But when the spell goes wrong, Jack blames the Wizard, not realizing that Jane Watermelonhead has a secret of her own!

programme.title: Dorothy and the Wizard of Oz
programme.desc: Woozy has been led astray and lost. His doppelganger is a Nome King powered Trojan Horse. Who would have thought Ozma would love him just the same?

programme.title: Dorothy and the Wizard of Oz
programme.desc: The Wicked Witch hears wedding bells.

programme.title: Dorothy and the Wizard of Oz

programme.title: Dorothy and the Wizard of Oz
programme.sub-title: CapN Bill in Going Nowhere Fast

programme.title: Grizzy ja lemmingud
programme.desc: Grizzy sets sail with his fishing gear. But he has no intention of fishing: its a scheme to enjoy a jar of Yummy chocolate spread alone in peace. The Lemmings sense the subterfuge and sink his boat to get the treat, which sinks to the ocean depths. The characters dive in pursuit and discover a school of intelligent crabs that live in an underwater city. Their treasure is a substance thats even yummier than Yummy.

programme.title: Grizzy ja lemmingud
programme.desc: The Lemmings find the cabin upside down. Upon closer inspection, it looks like an epic battle took place there. And Grizzy isnt here. The curious Lemmings start imagining what could have happened, visualizing the most improbable scenes for us. They decide to follow their lead to find Grizzy and confirm their zany theories.

programme.title: Grizzy ja lemmingud
programme.desc: The Lemmings discover an old book of magic spells with a formula that enables one to take on the appearance of any other creature. The Lemmings have the bright idea of transforming one their kin into a double of the she-bear Grizzy is madly in love with in order to trick him. How could Grizzy refuse to give his jar of chocolate spread to his sweetheart?

programme.title: Grizzy ja lemmingud
programme.desc: When Grizzy propels the Lemmings out of the log cabin perched on the Great Wall of China, the critters land on a small traditional house in a bamboo forest where they discover a box filled with fortune cookies. One Lemming gets super lucky after eating one. Armed with their magic cookies, the Lemmings set out to confront Grizzy. But each cookie represents a power… or a curse!

programme.title: Grizzy ja lemmingud
programme.desc: The Lemmings love sesame nougat but Grizzy, who adores this treat too, steals their box. Quite upset, the rodents search for more, in vain. Instead, they discover the art of energy points in an old Chinese medicine book. Determined to recover their sweets regardless of the cost, the Lemmings activate Grizzys vital points and the bear finds himself completely blocked. Thanks to the book, Grizzy frees himself and learns to master energies in turn.

programme.title: Grizzy ja lemmingud
programme.desc: After being thrown out of the log cabin by Grizzy, the Lemmings find a dragon statue with a mysterious stone in a temple. Touching the stone makes a fleeting tattoo appear on their bellies, temporarily endowing them with the mastery of Shaolin Kung Fu. The Lemmings return to the cabin and uproot Grizzy with ease! But Grizzy has not said his last word and manages to get hold of the magic stone.

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: Mr Bean is painting a picture of Teddy when he accidently squirts some green paint onto his brown wallpaper. Oh no! Bean needs to redecorate his room fast but ends up painting all the walls a garish lime green instead of brown. Hes so terrified of Mrs Wicket finding out that when he goes to bed he has some very weird nightmares - with a rather sickly ending.

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: Mr Bean is no fan of wrestling. But hes promised to take Mrs Wicket and her friend Mrs Wince to a big wrestling match in town. Bean finds himself lost backstage at the stadium and accidentally wanders through a door and straight into the wrestling ring where he finds himself up against Side Kick Rick. More by luck than talent Bean wins the match - only to find that now he has to fight the terrifying Bruise Force.

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: Mr Bean needs to see a very rare bird so he can tick off every page in his bird-spotting book. But he soon gets bored as he waits in a hide for the rare bird to appear. Instead he goes home and paints a picture of the bird cuts it out and sticks it high up a tree in the back garden. Soon he is besieged by excited twitchers who think it really is the rare bird. They are all keen to get a snap and theyre willing to pay good money for a peek.

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: Mr Bean finds himself babysitting a baboon.

programme.title: Tom ja Jerry
programme.desc: Toms being unusually difficult when hes rocked by an epiphany-- HES LOSING HIS HAIR! Paranoid that hes going to become a hairless cat, Tom will do anything Jerry tells him to do in order to regrow it. Think mud packs (more like mud slaps), hair transfers (one word - furballs) deep tissue massage to stimulate follicle development (a.k.a repeated blows to the head), and skunk therapy (nuf said). Most everything he tries only leads to Ginger throwing him in the bath again. Ultimately, Tom realizes that Jerrys spiking his cat shampoo with hair remover and its about to get hairy for the mouse!

programme.title: Tom ja Jerry
programme.desc: When Toms hit by a trolley while he and Jerry are investigating their latest case, hes sent to recover at the local animal hospital. But a detective is never off the case! Tom begins to suspect the answer to the case theyre working on is right under his broken nose. Problem is, hes in traction and cant move. Thats okay, hes got a partner in crime-solving - Doc Jerry makes the rounds at the animal hospital and solves the mystery, but not before sending Tom on the rounds to endure various tests (e.g. x-rays, stress test, physical therapy, etc…) and to do some investigating of his own.

programme.title: Tom ja Jerry
programme.desc: Tom accidentally puts a spell on Santa that transforms him into a cookie. When he cant figure out how to transform him back Tom and Jerry volunteer to help Santa deliver gifts. A Christmas miracle occurs when Tom and Jerry sacrifice their own gifts for each other.

programme.title: Tom ja Jerry
programme.desc: Tom and Jerry save King Arthurs kingdom from and evil sorcerer Morgan. / A bet between two farmers over who can raise the biggest pig goes haywire for the farm hands. / An ancient flying machine is discovered in Postlewaite Manor. / An oompah land retelling of the Rumplestiltskein story. / A couple of tricksters use Lil Quacker as their "magnificent" side show act in order to bilk the locals out of their cash. / From the security of his treehouse, Tom wages battle with Spike and Jerry. Director: Darrell Van Citters,.

programme.title: Tom ja Jerry
programme.desc: A lost little lamb appears at Maudes farm.

programme.title: Tom ja Jerry
programme.desc: A Tom and Jerry take on the Johnny Appleseed story.

programme.title: Tom ja Jerry
programme.desc: Tom is mistakenly placed in a shelter for homeless animals and forced to join the shelters rock-n-roll while Jerry lives the life of Riley back home.

programme.title: Lamput
programme.desc: While trying to escape from the Docs, Lamput stumbles into a hole in the ground, which leads in an underground civilization with a large tribe in it! Lamput gets misunderstood as the Chosen One according to the tribes prophecy. The tribe hails Lamput as the prophet and this proves to be a huge challenge for the Docs to catch Lamput, now that Lamput is surrounded by worshippers and guards at all times!

programme.title: Lamput
programme.desc: Tired of the daily chores at home, Lamput buys a bottle of Super-Strength potion from a roadside salesman! A happy and super-strong Lamput now wraps up his chores with extra ease! When the Docs sneak up to catch him, they get accidentally knocked out by Lamput. Finally, the Docs realize Lamputs secret! They steal the biggest bottle of Super-Strength potion and pour it all over themselves. The Docs super-actions backfire and eventually land them in jail - all this with Lamput blissfully unaware of all that happened!

programme.title: Lamput
programme.desc: Lamput outsmarts the Docs by luring them onto a street basketball court and pitting them against the toughest ballerz in town. When the jocks look like utterly destroying poor old Specs and Skinny, Lamputs conscience kicks in. Our orange buddy decides to help the Docs out with some of that special brand of court magic. Fate is fickle, though - when it comes out that the Docs are using a performance-enhancing orange blob, the jocks call foul. Specs and Skinny are reminded yet again what it feels like to be dunked on.

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: Gothams annual dog show is tonight, and Harley plans to compete for the prized "Best in Show" ribbon. Sensing shes up to no good, Robin decides to enter rough-and-tumble Ace the Bat-Dog to keep an eye on the thieving trickster.

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: Bam must lead a new super vehicle team consisting of Nightbike, Goldie, Grundy, and Kitty after the Legion of Zoom traps the rest of the Batwheels in the Batcave.

programme.title: Alice and Lewis
programme.desc: Alice and Lewis find the twins frozen in place! It turns out to be the doing of a young Freeze-All Cutie-Twee who has become friends with Charlie. In fact, these two besties are having the time of their lives, traveling all over the place, freezing the whole Kingdom, unaware that the young Cutie-Twee has not yet mastered its powers! Alice and Lewis must find a way to persuade Charlie to take the Cutie-Twee back to its peers.

programme.title: Alice and Lewis
programme.desc: When the Wonderland cuckoos realize their precious wild strawberry pies have all been picked, its mayhem! They go bonkers, screeching up a storm, almost deafening our poor friends. The Queen subsequently orders Alice and Lewis to put an end to this din! But the mission gets tricky when our two heroes find out who picked the pies!

programme.title: Barneys World
programme.desc: Determined to save the community garden, Barney and the kids go on a magical adventure where they become butterflies, and help a little ladybug with a big problem. They ultimately learn that doing small things can affect big change!

programme.title: Barneys World
programme.desc: David cant agree on what to play, so the kids end up playing different games. Barney has a hard time keeping up with both games. Silly chaos ensues, and David is reminded that its important to consider others perspectives, too.

programme.title: Lamput
programme.desc: Its the night of the Big Dance, and Skinny has some serious moves ready to go. Shame well never get to see them; Skinny practices so hard that he renders himself unconscious. Luckily Skinny has a guardian angel in the form of a morphing orange blob. Lamput tries everything to wake Skinny back up, but nothing works; Lamput is gonna have to go above and beyond. Skinny (still out cold) shows up to the dance in a bright orange suit that seems to have a life of its own, and proceeds to tear up the dancefloor. When Skinny finally comes to, he finds out he was the hit of the big dance. Skinny walks off with the trophy and the gal. No-one thinks to thank lil Lamput. For a sworn enemy, this blob sure is a good friend.

After observing a chameleon toad that is able to blend into its surroundings, the Lemmings decide to make themselves invisible to attain Grizzys treasure.

programme.title: Grizzy ja lemmingud
programme.desc: A magic tomahawk divides Grizzy into two identical bears with diametrically opposite personalities, one short-tempered, the other super-sweet. The Lemmings, who did not witness Grizzys split, will have a hard time working out the behavior of their usual enemy, who seems to swing from excessive kindness to the worst trickery for no reason.

programme.title: Grizzy ja lemmingud
programme.desc: After studying a magazine advertisement with a couple standing in front of an SUV, Grizzy imagines that if only he had a nice car, his favorite she-bear would be interested in him. He decides to confiscate the Lemmings crate on wheels and give it a serious overhaul. The Lemmings have nothing against an upgrade, as long as they remain behind the wheel!

programme.title: Lamput
programme.desc: Lamput takes refuge in a fancy hotel. Specs and Skinny bluff their way past the doorman by acting like they come from the expensive side of the tracks. Spoiler: they dont. The honeymoon suite is like nothing theyve ever seen; the Docs sheen of respectability quickly evaporates when theres robes to wear and beds to jump on. Their taste of the good life doesnt last long, though; another Lamput chase results in a proper trashed hotel room, just like you read about. Then downstairs for some à la carte chaos in the hotel restaurant. Its bad news for the Docs when the tab comes due; a Lab wage wont cover these extras.

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: Bean wants to avoid lunch with Irmas Mum at all costs. He persuades Mrs. Wicket to let him join her on a coach trip to a concert - but he has to disguise himself as an old-aged pensioner or he wont be allowed on the coach. Once on the coach Bean drives everyone mad with his anti-boredom antics.

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: Bean is showing Irma his favourite tree in the park one day when he discovers a tree surgeon getting ready to cut it down. He darts up the tree and wont come back down. Irma loves this new side of Bean-ey! The tree surgeon is frustrated and tries various ploys to get Bean down. But can Bean make it to the toilet without being discovered and still save that tree?

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: Mrs. Wicket is persuaded by a jaunty estate agent to put her house up for sale. Bean is distraught - where will he live? Not Mrs. Wickets problem. Bean decides to hi-jack the sales process in order to deter all potential buyers - even if it means turning the whole house upside down!

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: Mr. Bean wants to learn skateboarding but hurts himself on his first try. Meanwhile Miss Wince is showing off her new mobility scooter at Mrs. Wickets. Bean is entranced. He could do wicked "ollies" with that! He absconds with a souped-up scooter and heads straight to the skate park ready to challenge Bruiser Senior and Junior …

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: Mrs. Wicket becomes annoyingly inconsolable when Scrapper goes missing - calling for him at all hours of the day and night. Bean cant get any sleep! He decides that the only way to restore peace in the household is to go out and find Scrapper himself - a journey that takes him deep into Londons sewers …

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: Bean discovers Mrs. Wickets nephew and Bruiser Jnr swapping football stickers and decides that he wants to fill up a sticker album too. He buys-up all the stickers in the neighbourhood and has almost completed his task when Nephew points out that hes missing one: the famous sticker owned by local footballing celebrity Jamie Studds. Bean turns thief to be the best collector of em all.

programme.title: Lamput
programme.desc: The orange blob is down at the Museum, nerding out about ancient Egypt, when the Docs show up and ruin Lamputs day. Darn science geeks. No respect for culture. A superior knowledge of history keeps Lamput one step ahead of the blue boffins - how many times can two chemists get kicked out of the same Museum? The Docs sneak back into the exhibition disguised as mummies. They learn the hard way that a disguise can be TOO good; they get locked into a glass box overnight. Lucky break, though; this is the night when a renowned jewel thief tries to steal the museums precious treasures. Lamput and the Docs get tangled up in the heist. The rest is history.

programme.title: Barneys World
programme.desc: Determined to save the community garden, Barney and the kids go on a magical adventure where they become butterflies, and help a little ladybug with a big problem. They ultimately learn that doing small things can affect big change!

programme.title: Barneys World
programme.desc: David cant agree on what to play, so the kids end up playing different games. Barney has a hard time keeping up with both games. Silly chaos ensues, and David is reminded that its important to consider others perspectives, too.

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: Animated adventure series for younger viewers that follows a team of five superpowered vehicles - Bam, Redbird, Bibi, Batwing and Buff - as they are thrust into hijinks and action while learning important lessons about teamwork, friendship, and so much more helping Batman, Robin and Batgirl defend Gotham City. When Batcomputer shuts down for a system update, the other Batwheels must take over for her while aiding Batman in a battle against Harley Quinn.

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: Animated adventure series for younger viewers that follows a team of five superpowered vehicles - Bam, Redbird, Bibi, Batwing and Buff - as they are thrust into hijinks and action while learning important lessons about teamwork, friendship, and so much more helping Batman, Robin and Batgirl defend Gotham City. When MOE wants to know what its like to be a member of the Batwheels, the robot gets more than he bargained for when Bam invites him along for an exciting mission to stop Poison Ivy.

programme.title: Alice and Lewis
programme.desc: Alice drops in on Lewis unannounced, making him jump while hes adjusting the clock. Its a disaster: the clock goes on the blink and the facetious little cuckoo jumps on this opportunity to scram! The Queen is famished and says shell give Alice and Lewis a big punishment if the cuckoo isnt back in time to announce teatime! And so ensues a wacky and very lively cuckoo hunt involving everyone… Teatime can NOT be late, no matter what!!

programme.title: Alice and Lewis
programme.desc: Alice and Lewis are about to play Twee-boing, a tennis of sorts played in Wonderland. But the two besties are having so much fun that the jealous Queen takes Lewis place, appointing Alice HER best friend! Alice and Lewis try to explain to the monarch just how friendship works but its all gobbledygook to her! Now, theyre going to have to find a ruse to have fun together despite this "third wheel!"

programme.title: Tom ja Jerry
programme.desc: Tom is determined to hijack the fun Jerry and Tuffy are having with making paper airplanes. Toms hijinks take a turn for the worse when he realizes hes made a paper airplane out of Gingers great-great grandmothers treasured fruitcake recipe.

programme.title: Tom ja Jerry
programme.desc: If Tom isnt recovered from his injury before Rick and Ginger leave for their weekend getaway, Tom will be forced to stay at the Jolly Friends Pet Oasis, which is anything but jolly for Tom. Jerry goes to great lengths to tempt Tom to do anything but rest. After all, a weekend without Tom is a holiday for Jerry.

programme.title: Tom ja Jerry
programme.desc: Hildie and Beatie commemorate the passing of their Mother and Tom tries to help out by bringing her back from the grave. She is so evil that the witches command Tom to make a spell to send her back. Tom and Jerry must find a way to send her back and must outwit the Moms evil spellbook bent on keeping her here.

programme.title: Lamput
programme.desc: Lamput cant stop reading and gets caught! Back at the lab, the story intrigues everyone who is brought on a captivating adventure - featuring Lamput, Specs and Skinny in the leading role of a classic folktale. Robinput and his mates fight evil dictatorship for the perfect bedtime story.

programme.title: Lamput
programme.desc: Theres Football Fever as the Docs and Lamput go to watch the game! In the second half of the game, they end up on the pitch! Lamput causes havoc for the Docs as he disguises himself as flags, jerseys, whistles and even the football, but as they get closer to the 90th minute, they realise that its a team effort to win, and the game needs everyone to be on the same side.

programme.title: Lamput
programme.desc: Pregnant Doc: During a chase, Specs accidentally swallows Lamput. The Docs plan to bring Lamput back to the lab! However, Specs gets misunderstood by bystanders as a pregnant mother in labor and gets dragged to a hospital against his will. While Specs gets used to being a mother-to-be, Skinny tries to get the two of them out of the hospital and back to the lab. Will Lamput stay in Specs tummy this whole time?Reverse: In a new attempt to catch Lamput, The Docs invent a remote that reverses anything back in time. Lamput must try to escape while constantly being pulled back into the Docs grasp!

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: Theres easy money to be had in the art world and Mr. Bean is set on getting some of it. Once equipped with the right tools, he ventures into the countryside with a blank canvas in search of inspiration - and comes home with a painting full of life. Literally.

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: When Mr. Bean finds a fly in his room, its war. He needs weapons. Fly spray? A rolled-up magazine? These are only the start. In desperation, he enlists a mouldy doughnut, an encyclopaedia, an upside-down dustbin and a club-hammer. Finally, Bean becomes the first man in history to wage war on a fly... with a fridge.

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: A leisurely stroll in the park turns into a run when Mr. Bean is chased home by an angry Mime Artist. He is lost for more words than usual when the street performer makes himself at home and insists on being wined and dined. Bean ousts the pest from his house using the only language mime artists understand.

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: Its the First Day of Spring and Mr. Bean sets about washing his clothes, his furniture, his teddy and himself. But, alas, theres no hot water! A bit of inventive improvisation with an outside drainpipe proves Mr. Bean to be greener at D.I.Y. plumbing than he thought.

programme.title: Lamput
programme.desc: ""Chasing Lamput" turns out to be the ultimate backstage pass; the Docs pursue the orange blob through the dressing room and directly onto the stage of a gigantic stadium rock concert. The crowd goes wild. Which raises questions about their taste in music, to be honest; Skinny plays guitar like hes gotten himself tangled in the strings (which he has), and Specs drumming, well, its certainly got passion. No taste, skill or rhythm, but certainly passion. The stage ends up in tatters by the time the actual band arrives. Those Docs are a hard act to follow.

programme.title: Grizzy ja lemmingud
programme.desc: Grizzy dreams of drinking some nice cold coconut milk on the couch. Step one, get rid of the Lemmings who are having fun flying through the living room. Two, find coconuts that havent been emptied of their nectar. While Grizzy struggles to pick coconuts that are too high up, the Lemmings find a magic conch. By simply dusting yourself with its sand, you can fly! It doesnt take Grizzy long to figure this out and the bear rapidly imagines himself as Peter Pan sipping on his easily-harvested coconut milk.

programme.title: Grizzy ja lemmingud
programme.desc: Grizzy wants to watch TV in peace. The Lemmings have other plans: they want to have fun playing music with homemade instruments. Exasperated by the racket theyre making in the garage, Grizzy destroys the instruments and sends the Lemmings flying. The Lemmings discover a magic ukulele that bewitches anyone who hears its music: the perfect tool to regain control of the cabin and get back to their concert.

programme.title: Grizzy ja lemmingud
programme.desc: Grizzy finds a strange creature fossilized in amber resin that resembles him. A natural science encyclopedia confirms that its his ancestor. Grizzy wants to take the block of amber, but the Lemmings fight him for it because the blue animal with big teeth is their ancestor too. The block cracks during their fight and frees the ancestor who turns out to be a rather unmanageable burden.

programme.title: Grizzy ja lemmingud
programme.desc: The Lemmings find a strange card game representing the elements along with instructions. The idea is to pretend that the ground is on fire or of ice, like in the game "Floor is Lava." They transform the cabin into a giant adventure trail. Depending on the card drawn, they must avoid zones on the floor with flames or wax. Grizzy unceremoniously gets rids of the setup to regain control of the cabin. One of the cards lands on a stone slab that transforms into lava. The Lemmings are delighted: they will be able to play "for real"!

programme.title: Grizzy ja lemmingud
programme.desc: The Lemmings discover a very particular cocoa tree with chocolate-spread sap! Reduced to eating canned Brussels sprouts, the only remaining food in the cabin, Grizzy is baffled when he sees the Lemmings parading past to equip themselves with all sorts of containers: ladles, soup spoons, bowls, buckets, basins, etc. He watches them through binoculars and discovers that they have planted a faucet in a tree where chocolate spread flows. Grizzy decides to siphon off their tree.

programme.title: Grizzy ja lemmingud
programme.desc: Grizzy expels the Lemmings from the cabin where they had built a cumbersome obstacle course. Peaceful at last and feeling lazy, he is determined not to leave his couch. The Lemmings discover a magic Mayan disc that allows you to choose instantaneous mutations of other animals features: bat wings, reindeer antlers, elephant trunks, etc. The mutant Lemmings return to the cabin, determined to continue playing their game while enjoying their new accessories.

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: Mr. Bean meets an aristocratic old lady when he nearly runs over her lapdog with his mini. Hes thrilled to be invited for luncheon at her grand but strangely shabby mansion. Bean is determined to rise to the occasion. Hes so busy with matters of protocol he doesnt notice that the lady and her sinister butler arent quite what they seem…

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: How does one choose tasteful wallpaper these days? After watching a royal documentary on TV, Mr. Bean decides to decorate his room in the style of Buckingham Palace. If the Queens new wallpaper is good enough for Her Royal Highness, then its going to be good enough for him. Meanwhile, his landlady, Mrs. Wicket, suffers from illusions of grandeur and crowns herself Queen of the street.

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: Mr. Bean finds himself in a race to grow a giant marrow with his next-door neighbour. Theres prize money at stake and a chance to get his photo in the papers. And so, as the competition gets tough, Beans gardening techniques become more ingenious, unconventional and desperate.

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: Hes got her record, the poster and the T-shirt, so when Mr. Beans heart-throb, Roxy, is set to sing in concert at the London Palladium, he sets his sights on the only thing that will make his life complete: her signature in his autograph book. A difficult feat but can love prevail?

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: Mr Beans electricity is cut off so he builds a wind turbine - all fine until theres too much wind! / Mr Bean attempts to retrieve his cash card and "accidently" ends up inside a bank vault. / Mr Bean is tired of litterbugs and attempts to clean up the whole town himself…with disastrous results. / Mr Bean has to deal with an unwanted house guest but the stubborn pest refuses to leave. / Mr Bean tries to be romantic but his idea of romance is very different from his girlfriends. / Mr Bean enters a competition to win a trolley of free food! / Mr Bean meets a soul mate. / Mr Bean makes his own horror movie and ropes in Mrs Wicket as the star!

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: Mr Bean is unimpressed with a horror movie he sees at the cinema and reckons he can do much better. Bean sets out to create his very own home movie masterpiece -featuring Mrs Wicket Irma and Teddy! The screening in the garden is a huge success but will Mrs Wicket be pleased with her makeover and starring role?

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: Mr Bean has to look after Mrs Wickets pet goldfish while she is away. With a ravenous Scrapper sniffing around Bean ends up becoming more bodyguard than babysitter. But when he manages to lose his fishy friend Mr Bean takes a nightmare journey down the sewer and back to his neighbours house via the park. Can Mr Bean get the pesky pet back in the bowl before Mrs Wicket returns home?

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: Mr Bean wins two tickets for an exotic cruise and naturally he takes Teddy along for the trip of a lifetime. Once aboard the huge ocean liner Mr Bean soon settles into a life of luxury but while showing off to a new friend Bean becomes "man overboard" and stranded on a dessert island. The hungrier he gets the wilder he becomes and desperate to find a way off the island.

programme.title: Grizzy ja lemmingud
programme.desc: While fighting over a jelly cake, Grizzy banishes the Lemmings to the castle dungeons and the rodents discover a passageway leading to a secret elfin room. The Lemmings activate a secret mechanism, transforming their surroundings into a "heroic fantasy" world where they are elves, the sheep are goblins, and Grizzy is a magician. The jelly cake battle now takes on epic dimensions!

programme.title: Grizzy ja lemmingud
programme.desc: The Lemmings take Polaroid snapshots of themselves disguised outside the castle along with a sheep who poses with them. But smelling the scent of Grizzys cookies in the cabin, the sheep abandons them. The bears heart is softened by the little ball of wool and consents to share (some of) his snack. He pampers the creature and grows fond of it, but the rodents want their pal back!

programme.title: Grizzy ja lemmingud
programme.desc: Grizzy is pulled out of his dreams by the rambunctious Lemmings who are jousting on sheep. The sly bear gets rid of the rodents by enticing their mounts away with food. Irritated, the Lemmings scheme to remove the bear from the castle during his nap and prevent him from ever returning. Furious at being banished, the bear prepares his revenge, armed with a catapult.

programme.title: Grizzy ja lemmingud
programme.desc: With a ring that lets their astral bodies travel, the Lemmings decide to haunt Grizzy.

programme.title: Grizzy ja lemmingud
programme.desc: Grizzy and the Lemmings fight over a giant jelly cake. Their chase leads them to the castle library, where the Lemmings accidentally activate the opening of a secret passage. The hidden room conceals numerous volumes of magic books. When opened, each book makes the story content or characters appear in real life. The bear and the rodents covet the same work: one with dessert recipes!

programme.title: Grizzy ja lemmingud
programme.desc: Grizzy chases the Lemmings throughout the castle to swipe the delicious jelly cake they were about to eat. He locks them inside a closet and makes off with the dessert. In the closet, the rodents discover a card that enables them to teleport the magic piece of furniture. They free themselves and recover the cake out from under the stunned bears nose. Grizzy understands that hes been tricked, but will he let things go at that?

programme.title: Grizzy ja lemmingud
programme.sub-title: The Bear, the Frog and the Mosquito
programme.desc: The Lemmings have fun bouncing off the backs of harmless green frogs while Grizzy chases some mosquitos buzzing around him in vain. / Grizzy comes home to the cabin and discovers the super fired-up Lemmings dancing madly to the sound of the ghetto blaster. / A confrontation between Grizzy and the Lemmings leads to a room in the castle tower. The bear accidentally sets off a mechanism and discovers a large medieval magic trunk.

programme.title: Grizzy ja lemmingud
programme.desc: Grizzy comes home to the cabin and discovers the super fired-up Lemmings dancing madly to the sound of the ghetto blaster. The Lemmings are thrown out into the jungle where they meet a parrot that can reproduce any sound identically. The bird becomes their ally to distract Grizzy and recover their musical equipment, but the mission foils and the gadget breaks. A microprocessor falls out and sticks to the bird, who starts picking up musical waves!

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: Animated adventure series for younger viewers that follows a team of five superpowered vehicles - Bam, Redbird, Bibi, Batwing and Buff - as they are thrust into hijinks and action while learning important lessons about teamwork, friendship, and so much more helping Batman, Robin and Batgirl. Redbird gets excited when he learns that Batman and Robin are taking him and Bam for a drive up the coast - unfortunately, the Joker and his van Prank show up unexpectedly and ruin Redbirds beach day plans.

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: Animated adventure series for younger viewers that follows a team of five superpowered vehicles - Bam, Redbird, Bibi, Batwing and Buff - as they are thrust into hijinks and action while learning important lessons about teamwork, friendship, and so much more helping Batman, Robin and Batgirl. When the Joker floods the Batcave, the Batwheels evacuate and relocate to a nearby parking garage - as they adapt to their new home, they learn important lessons about family and making the most of things.

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: Animated adventure series for younger viewers that follows a team of five superpowered vehicles - Bam, Redbird, Bibi, Batwing and Buff - as they are thrust into hijinks and action while learning important lessons about teamwork, friendship, and so much more helping Batman, Robin and Batgirl defend Gotham City. When Batman refuses to race with the Joker, Prank goads Bam into a rematch - can Bam learn not to give in to the bullys dares and take the high road?

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: Animated adventure series for younger viewers that follows a team of five superpowered vehicles - Bam, Redbird, Bibi, Batwing and Buff - as they are thrust into hijinks and action while learning important lessons about teamwork, friendship, and so much more helping Batman, Robin and Batgirl defend Gotham City. After struggling to solve a riddle from Riddlers helicopter Quizz, Redbird must learn to speak up and share his ideas with the Batwheels if they hope to figure out the villains scheme.

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders
programme.desc: The Looney Builders prepare to host a big holiday lights festival in Looneyburg Park when an unexpected snowstorm prevents Looneyburgers from attending, so they need to come up with a plan to prevent the event from being cancelled.

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders
programme.desc: Animated series for young viewers that follows Bugs Bunny, Lola Bunny, Daffy Duck, Porky Pig and Tweety Bird as they use amazing vehicles to take on the looniest construction jobs while learning lessons along the way. When Marvin the Martian crash lands in Looneyburg, hes in a hurry to leave and hires the Looney Builders to build him a spaceship.

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders
programme.desc: Animated series for young viewers that follows Bugs Bunny, Lola Bunny, Daffy Duck, Porky Pig and Tweety Bird as they use amazing vehicles to take on the looniest construction jobs while learning lessons along the way. When Marvin the Martian hires the Looney Builders to build a doghouse on Mars for his puppy K-9, Daffy soon bonds with the adorable pooch and comes up with a plan to prolong their playtime.

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders
programme.desc: Animated series for young viewers that follows Bugs Bunny, Lola Bunny, Daffy Duck, Porky Pig and Tweety Bird as they use amazing vehicles to take on the looniest construction jobs while learning lessons along the way. Daffy tries to show off to prove how cool he is when his hip cousin Billy hires the Looney Builders to build her an art studio.

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: Mr Bean is furious with the untidy state of the streets and all the people who drop litter so he goes on a one-man mission to clean up the town. Armed with several bin bags Mr Bean collects all the rubbish and puts up his own "No Littering" signs - which have absolutely no effect. When the police show no interest in his campaign Bean builds a homemade vacuuming contraption causing chaos and mayhem wherever he goes.

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: Mr Bean is very scared on a stormy night and even more so when he hears Mrs Wicket screaming from downstairs. Mr Bean investigates and finds the source of the problem...a rat! Mr Bean offers to help Mrs Wicket rid their house of the troublesome rodent. The only problem is the crafty rat is going nowhere fast and is always one step ahead. Mr Bean looks to inspiration from the Pied Piper but fairy stories dont always have happy endings.

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: Mr Bean decides to do something romantic on Valentines Day for his long-suffering girlfriend Irma. But while he is secretly delivering her valentines card Mr Bean finds out he has a love rival for Irmas attention. Bean steps up his efforts and takes Irma on a "date" to the Valentines Fair only to find his love rival is there too! But will the fortune-tellers prediction be the ticket to a happy ending?

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: Mr Bean has forgotten hes supposed to be cooking dinner for his long-suffering girlfriend Irma. He dashes to the supermarket to buy some groceries but why buy food when you can win an entire trolley full in an All You Can Eat Competition? But Mr Bean has some stiff competition - no one can eat one of Mr Maggs pies quicker than Mr Maggs himself. Mr Bean has to think fast to win. But after all that eating will Bean still be in the mood to cook a romantic meal?

programme.title: Moley
programme.desc: Squirm and Manny set up camp, but are soon disturbed by something out of this world!

programme.title: Mikk-Mikk ja seenerahvas
programme.desc: Lilit korraldab kontserdi, et Mampel saaks seenerahvale esineda, aga siis selgub, et Mampli haal pole just kiita...

programme.title: Mikk-Mikk ja seenerahvas
programme.desc: Mikk-Mikk ja Kubarapoiss lahevad tulli. Kas neil õnnestub ara leppida?

programme.title: Mikk-Mikk ja seenerahvas
programme.desc: Mikk-Mikk ja Lilit puuavad Kubarapoissi veenda, et seenerahva iidsed parimuslood on puhas tõde.

programme.title: Mikk-Mikk ja seenerahvas
programme.desc: Tana võistlevad Mikk-Mikk ja Kubarapoiss omavahel, kumb tohib olla Tahekubara abiline.

programme.title: Grizzy ja lemmingud
programme.desc: Grizzy is captivated by a mime artist on TV who makes viewers believe in the presence of an invisible wall. To get rid of the Lemmings, who have sights on his jar of Yummy, Grizzy hides the jar and pretends he has an invisible one. When the Lemmings see through the trick, they decide to trap Grizzy with a grand illusion number.

programme.title: Grizzy ja lemmingud
programme.desc: Once again Grizzy shows the Lemmings that they just dont measure up to him physically and that the last jar of chocolate spread is for the strongest. / The Lemmings lay their hands on a full crate of chocolate spread which they hide somewhere behind Grizzys back. / Grizzy is persuaded that hes discovered the ultimate gadget for good living. / The Lemmings clamor for their turn to play with the rangers mobile phone but Grizzy isnt in the sharing mood. / Grizzy is captivated by a mime artist on TV who makes viewers believe in the presence of an invisible wall. / The Lemmings shiver with cold sneeze and are glassy-eyed: they have a big fat cold!

programme.title: Grizzy ja lemmingud
programme.desc: The Lemmings find a pack of icy mints that literally chill your breath. One blast from anyone who eats them freezes everything in sight. Grizzy does not particularly care for this frosty ambiance and tries to take their candy away.

programme.title: Grizzy ja lemmingud
programme.desc: Grizzy cant believe it: he has just swallowed a spoonful of his favorite food, chocolate spread, and he hates it! How could that be possible? And yet, when he swiped the jar from the Lemmings, they seemed to be enjoying it immensely. A quick investigation reveals that the Lemmings added a dash of lemon juice to the jar to give the spread a sharper taste. And they intend to jazz up the rest of the stock as well!

programme.title: Grizzy ja lemmingud
programme.desc: Grizzy discovers the fondness of his beloved she-bear for meditation. To seduce her, he sets out to prove to her that he too can attain the Zen attitude. This demands practice, of course, but it especially demands lots of willpower and concentration to get rid of the rowdy Lemmings without losing ones temper.

programme.title: Grizzy ja lemmingud
programme.desc: Grizzy and the Lemmings discover a super-secret Canadian Army prototype which resembles a simple computer keyboard. It has only several command keys: select, cut and paste, and delete, but the keys act directly on surrounding elements... as well as on living beings!

programme.title: Grizzy ja lemmingud
programme.desc: The Lemmings are having a blast with a bowling game they found in the Rangers storeroom. Grizzy hastens to destroy the pins to ensure his peace and quiet. But the Lemmings discover a remote-control device that can modify the balls weight. By setting it on maximum, the ball could knock over much more than pins: furniture, a bear and even a log cabin!

programme.title: Grizzy ja lemmingud
programme.desc: After the rains, to the great delight of the Lemmings, strange bouncing mushrooms have sprouted in the yard. To put an end to the Lemmings noisy games - which prevent Grizzy from enjoying his peace and quiet - Grizzy tramples the mushrooms. Only to realize that each crushed mushroom frees a cloud of spores that instantly creates… a bunch of identical mushrooms.

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.sub-title: Where Did You Get That Cat?
programme.desc: The animated antics of the hapless bumbler Mr Bean. Mr Bean chases Scrapper around Mrs Wickets flat but her sideboard tumbles over, and when Bean sees a bit of fur poking out from under it, he is horrified to think he has squashed poor Scrapper. Not realising that it is only his landladys furry hat, Bean rushes what he thinks is a flattened cat across town to the vet in a desperate attempt to save his feline friends life.

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: Mr Bean becomes a famous internet sensation. / Mr Bean plays gooseberry when Mrs Wicket falls in love with a man Mr Bean doesnt trust. / Mr Bean tries to be romantic but his idea of romance is very different from his girlfriends. / Mrs. Wickets Nephew is staying with her when he wins two tickets to an Outward Bound course. She refuses to go but then ropes in Bean to look after the child.

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: Mr Bean loves Halloween and prepares to give the neighbourhood kids some tricks and treats they wont forget. But when Mr Bean gets carried away with his spooky pranks he becomes the target of even more fiendish tricks from his neighbours the Bruisers.

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: Mr Bean is painting a picture of Teddy when he accidently squirts some green paint onto his brown wallpaper. Oh no! Bean needs to redecorate his room fast but ends up painting all the walls a garish lime green instead of brown. Hes so terrified of Mrs Wicket finding out that when he goes to bed he has some very weird nightmares - with a rather sickly ending.

programme.title: Mikk-Mikk ja seenerahvas
programme.desc: When Mushpie gets sick, our Mushlers find it impossible to believe that she turns into the most demanding Mushable ever. Well, theyre about to find out that its all true!

programme.title: Mikk-Mikk ja seenerahvas
programme.desc: Fung finds out that to earn a delicious treat from Sushi-Mushi you just need to look after the Food Snail for him. No problem! Actually, it becomes a huge problem for Fung!

programme.title: Mikk-Mikk ja seenerahvas
programme.desc: When Mushpot is too tired to give anyone advice, he asks Mush-Mush to answer the Mushables requests on his behalf.

programme.title: Mikk-Mikk ja seenerahvas
programme.desc: When Chep thinks he has remembered that he is younger than his two best friends, Mush-Mush and Lilit, it affects his whole confidence

programme.title: Mikk-Mikk ja seenerahvas
programme.desc: Mush-Mush, Chep and Lilit are ecstatic: Muddlers fear of spiders rid the forest of him!

programme.title: Šov Toma in Jerryja
programme.desc: Tom is up to his usual nonsense, but two can play at this game as they take their chase into the neighbourhood. Leave it to Jerry to turn the tables on Tom!

programme.title: Dorothy and the Wizard of Oz
programme.sub-title: The Return of the Silver Slippers: Part 1
programme.desc: Dorothy confides in Ozma that the ruby slippers are acting up. Ozma thinks they might be due for a "magic tune-up".

programme.title: Dorothy and the Wizard of Oz
programme.sub-title: The Return of the Silver Slippers: Part 2
programme.desc: The Wicked Witch of the West is back! Now everyone in Oz who ever opposed, doubted or betrayed her is in for a little payback and the land of Oz is terrified.

programme.title: Dorothy and the Wizard of Oz
programme.sub-title: The Return of the Silver Slippers: Part 3
programme.desc: With the Wizards help, Dorothy enters the mysterious, dark realm of the Wicked Witchs castle, with Toto, to recover the ruby slippers and restore Oz to its peaceful state.

programme.title: Dorothy and the Wizard of Oz
programme.sub-title: The Return of the Silver Slippers: Part 4
programme.desc: As Dorothy and the Wizard return to Emerald City, they see that Wicked Witch has turned the bright and sunshiny landscape to a dark and foreboding place.

programme.title: Dorothy and the Wizard of Oz
programme.desc: Frank and Lyman are getting tired of the outrageous demands that the Witches are making on them and the endless amount of work they have to do catering to every single one of the witches whims.

programme.title: Grizzy ja lemmingud
programme.desc: Grizzy dreams of drinking some nice cold coconut milk on the couch. Step one, get rid of the Lemmings who are having fun flying through the living room. Two, find coconuts that havent been emptied of their nectar. While Grizzy struggles to pick coconuts that are too high up, the Lemmings find a magic conch. By simply dusting yourself with its sand, you can fly! It doesnt take Grizzy long to figure this out and the bear rapidly imagines himself as Peter Pan sipping on his easily-harvested coconut milk.

programme.title: Grizzy ja lemmingud
programme.desc: Grizzy wants to watch TV in peace. The Lemmings have other plans: they want to have fun playing music with homemade instruments. Exasperated by the racket theyre making in the garage, Grizzy destroys the instruments and sends the Lemmings flying. The Lemmings discover a magic ukulele that bewitches anyone who hears its music: the perfect tool to regain control of the cabin and get back to their concert.

programme.title: Grizzy ja lemmingud
programme.desc: Grizzy and the Lemmings fight over the tablet. During their scuffle, they knock over an army crate which falls into the middle of the bamboo forest surrounding the cabin. Alerted by the noise, a peace missionary panda comes out of the forest and tries to calm down the worked-up adversaries. But will the limitless strategies of Grizzy and the Lemmings get the better of the pandas patience?

programme.title: Grizzy ja lemmingud
programme.desc: The Lemmings create a shadow puppet show where seven papercut lemmings confront a bear over a jar of Yummy chocolate spread. The Lemmings in the audience are super enthusiastic, but Grizzy is outraged by the treatment inflicted upon the bear. He decides to intervene and equips the paper bear with an armor and saber! The Lemmings retort with ninja effigies of themselves and mount an attack to recover the coveted jar of Yummy spread.

programme.title: Grizzy ja lemmingud
programme.desc: As Grizzy relaxes in the massage chair, a cloud drifts in front of the sun, immediately stopping the electricity supply in the log cabin. The voltage drops continue, even though the sky seems clear now. Grizzy looks out the window and a dragon appears on the horizon! Once over his initial fright, the bear realizes that its only a kite flown by the Lemmings - using the electricity from the cabin they have rerouted!

programme.title: Grizzy ja lemmingud
programme.desc: The Lemmings organize a drone race throughout the cabin. Grizzy, who was on the verge of falling asleep, interrupts the competition but must contend with the rodents reprisals. Thrown out of the cabin, the bear falls onto a temple dedicated to the Monkey King. He appropriates the statues powers, operating a magic cloud by remote control. Grizzy settles in on the cloud and wins the race before the Lemmings. But a cloud that flies that fast can only arouse lust…

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: Mr Bean fancies a game of golf so he creates his own golf course inside his flat and invites Irma to join him for a round. Their somewhat eccentric game takes them from sitting room to bathroom and through Mrs Wickets flat as they battle to be the winner of the First Bean Open Championship.

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: A crafty cat burglar is causing alarm and concern throughout the town with a series of daring rooftop robberies. After Mrs Wickets house is burgled and Bean has his wallet stolen he decides the only way to deal with this cunning housebreaker is to don a costume and become a superhero (like the ones in his favourite comic book). But Super Bean soon finds he has his hands full helping to rescue cats stuck in trees and old ladies with their spilled shopping.

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: Mr Bean is tidying his flat and chucking out a load of old unwanted junk. Unfortunately during the big clear out Teddy accidentally falls into a bin bag which gets put out in the street. Bean is horrified when the rubbish van arrives and he realises that dear old Teddy is now on his way to the landfill. Bean races across town to the dump but how will he ever find his friend amongst all the mountains of junk?

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: Mr Bean buys a robot to clean his flat, but it ends up trashing half the town.

programme.title: Tom ja Jerry
programme.desc: When a little cat and mouse ends poorly for Tom, he ends up having to wear the cone of shame. Unable to remove it, deal with the emotional shame, or adapt to the giant plastic funnel on his head, Tom must find meaning in the suffering.

programme.title: Tom ja Jerry
programme.desc: A little cat and mouse leads Jerry to take refuge in his hole in the wall where he runs into Franky Two-Face the rat, who now calls Jerrys home, HIS home. Tom finds this funny, of course. Franky Two-Face leads Tom to believe the two are working together but Frankys a no-good, dirty rat. He doesnt play fair. Hes a liar, a sneak, a dirty player, just an all-around dirty rat. He goes to the cats in the alley, says Jerry thinks theyre soft, steals things from Spike and sets Tom up as the thief. Franky Two-Face knows every dirty trick in the book, except one; the one Tom and Jerry use to get rid of Franky Two-Face.

programme.title: Tom ja Jerry
programme.desc: Jerry and Tuffy are getting ready to go to a family reunion and theyre mailing themselves off! Unfortunately Tuffy gets left behind. Although Tom Thinks Tuffy is easy pickings hes in for a surprise as Tuffy makes his life really difficult. Jerry races back home when he realizes he left Tuffy behind.

programme.title: Tom ja Jerry
programme.desc: The gang are determined to make Rick and Ginger change their mind about downsizing and moving to the big city by making it impossible to sell the house.

programme.title: Tom ja Jerry
programme.desc: A lineage check determines that Spike is descended from British aristocracy.

programme.title: Tom ja Jerry
programme.desc: Tom is tricked into believing he is invisible.

programme.title: Tom ja Jerry
programme.desc: Tyke undergoes a personality change after watching too many cop shows on TV.

programme.title: Lamput
programme.desc: The Docs are in the mountains, doing mountainy things. They look through their binoculars and see Lamput in the distance, doing his own mountainy things. GET HIM! After a dramatic chase across the mountain range, Lamput escapes into a cave and the Docs pursue, but its no ordinary cave. Its the home of a very grumpy dragon who loves his beauty sleep! The Docs are captured and Lamput has to come to the rescue to save the day. Luckily for him, his new forest buddies and his specular musical skills might just help in coming up with a solution.

programme.title: Lamput
programme.desc: The Docs chase Lamput to a haunted mansion populated by ghosts, monsters and all things spooky. Lamput makes quick friends with a ghost prince who happens to be the lord of the mansion, but the Docs run into much less friendlier characters while trying to catch Lamput.

programme.title: Lamput
programme.desc: Pregnant Doc: During a chase, Specs accidentally swallows Lamput. The Docs plan to bring Lamput back to the lab! However, Specs gets misunderstood by bystanders as a pregnant mother in labor and gets dragged to a hospital against his will. While Specs gets used to being a mother-to-be, Skinny tries to get the two of them out of the hospital and back to the lab. Will Lamput stay in Specs tummy this whole time?Reverse: In a new attempt to catch Lamput, The Docs invent a remote that reverses anything back in time. Lamput must try to escape while constantly being pulled back into the Docs grasp!

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: With Bibi in need of repairs, Batgirl takes Bam out for a spin to stop Mr. Freezes latest icy crime spree. Bam will have to get used to having Batgirl in the drivers seat and learn something new if hes going to help her stop Mr. Freeze!

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: When Santas sleigh is damaged, the Batwheels must help Santa deliver presents to the children of Gotham, and stop the Legion of Zoom from trying to steal them!

programme.title: Alice and Lewis
programme.desc: Today, Queen has decided to commission a unique dress from her talented Seamstress Card: she wants it made out of wild thread - a very difficult one to tame! And should her Seamstress Card fail to pull it off, she will be relieved of her duties on the spot! Alice and Lewis jump to it, coming up with all kinds of bright ideas to help out the poor card. As a result, in the end, a whole cat walk of dresses awaits the Queen!

programme.title: Alice and Lewis
programme.desc: Alice and Lewis make a "snow-woman" in the Queens likeness. But, miffed at not bearing a very strong resemblance to the original, she heads off to meet her model. Our two heroes are scared: their mockery is about to be discovered! But surprise surprise!: the Queen is anything but offended! In fact, she takes the snow-woman under her wing, even going so far as to appoint her her deputy! Unfortunately for Alice and Lewis, this icy substitute becomes just as moody as the Queen: now theyre going to have to do all they can to remind her who she truly is!

programme.title: Barneys World
programme.desc: Mel breaks her arm and is away from the park while she gets a cast. David really misses her, so Barney creates magical games to help David and Vivie do something nice for Mel for when she gets back.

programme.title: Barneys World
programme.desc: When Mel grows frustrated with the things she cant do while wearing a cast, Barney creates an imaginative game for the kids to play. Throughout the game, Mel learns to embrace her abilities with the help of a fantastical robot arm.

programme.title: Lamput
programme.desc: Lamput takes refuge in a fancy hotel. Specs and Skinny bluff their way past the doorman by acting like they come from the expensive side of the tracks. Spoiler: they dont. The honeymoon suite is like nothing theyve ever seen; the Docs sheen of respectability quickly evaporates when theres robes to wear and beds to jump on. Their taste of the good life doesnt last long, though; another Lamput chase results in a proper trashed hotel room, just like you read about. Then downstairs for some à la carte chaos in the hotel restaurant. Its bad news for the Docs when the tab comes due; a Lab wage wont cover these extras.

programme.title: Tom ja Jerry
programme.desc: Tom enlists the help of the lake monster to help terrorise the mouse village.

programme.title: Tom ja Jerry
programme.desc: A werewolf terrorizes Tom and the inhabitants of the Catsylvania village.

programme.title: Tom ja Jerry
programme.desc: Tom must compete with his American cousin for the right to remain a Butler at Postlewaite manor.

programme.title: Tom ja Jerry
programme.desc: Tom must compete with his American cousin for the right to remain a Butler at Postlewaite manor. / Tom and Jerry are forced to go back to Detective School in order to renew their detective licenses. / When Tom inadvertently set a Yeti loose on the town Jerry Van Mouseling must subdue the beast. / Tom serves an evil pirate determined to steal treasure belonging to the village mice until Jerry Van Mouseling foils his plans. / Tom turns into a Blob monster and proceeds to eat everything in sight including the village mice! Jerry Van Mouseling to the rescue! / Rick and Ginger leave town with instructions for Tom to keep the house in order but Jerrys got other ideas. Director: Darrell Van Citters,.

programme.title: Tom ja Jerry
programme.desc: When Tom inadvertently set a Yeti loose on the town Jerry Van Mouseling must subdue the beast.

programme.title: Tom ja Jerry
programme.desc: Jerry and Tuffy are getting ready to go to a family reunion and theyre mailing themselves off! Unfortunately Tuffy gets left behind. Although Tom Thinks Tuffy is easy pickings hes in for a surprise as Tuffy makes his life really difficult. Jerry races back home when he realizes he left Tuffy behind.

programme.title: Grizzy ja lemmingud
programme.desc: Grizzy dreams of drinking some nice cold coconut milk on the couch. Step one, get rid of the Lemmings who are having fun flying through the living room. Two, find coconuts that havent been emptied of their nectar. While Grizzy struggles to pick coconuts that are too high up, the Lemmings find a magic conch. By simply dusting yourself with its sand, you can fly! It doesnt take Grizzy long to figure this out and the bear rapidly imagines himself as Peter Pan sipping on his easily-harvested coconut milk.

programme.title: Grizzy ja lemmingud
programme.desc: Grizzy wants to watch TV in peace. The Lemmings have other plans: they want to have fun playing music with homemade instruments. Exasperated by the racket theyre making in the garage, Grizzy destroys the instruments and sends the Lemmings flying. The Lemmings discover a magic ukulele that bewitches anyone who hears its music: the perfect tool to regain control of the cabin and get back to their concert.

programme.title: Grizzy ja lemmingud
programme.desc: While chasing the Lemmings, who stole his jar of chocolate spread, Grizzy crashes into an arcade cabinet near the supermarket which displays a model fortuneteller and her crystal ball. Grizzy realizes that he can foresee events that are going to happen to him in the crystal ball, and namely the traps that the Lemmings have planned for him.

programme.title: Grizzy ja lemmingud
programme.desc: A newly unpacked UV tanning booth holds the place of honor in the middle of the cabin. Grizzy gets it into his head that a classy tan will help him draw the attention of the she-bear hes enamored with. When he opens the box, he discovers that the Lemmings have beat him to it and are already playing "beach party" inside the bed.

programme.title: Grizzy ja lemmingud
programme.desc: The Lemmings have turned the entire cabin topsy-turvy to organize medieval jousts with the rangers fencing gear. Grizzy who wishes to recover his couch tries to straighten up but is driven out by their fencing foils. To retaliate Grizzy must find a blade equal to the task. He opts for a fine frozen swordfish!

programme.title: Grizzy ja lemmingud
programme.desc: A strange object is delivered to the Rangers cabin: an over-board! Its a latest generation skateboard which levitates above the ground without wheels. The Lemmings immediately try to get their paws on it, but Grizzy also covets the board as a table to set his TV-dinners down on.

programme.title: Lamput
programme.desc: The Docs chase Lamput into the darkest jungle, where they have a go at the literal oldest trick in the book: a covered pit trap. Why these guys think this will work is anyones guess. Meanwhile Lamputs facing a whole different challenge: a lost baby elephant is looking for her mama, and seems to have a knack for getting in all kinds of trouble along the way. Lamput and the baby elephant do eventually find the mama pachyderm - with help from the Docs. And their stupid pit trap. Yet again these guys have caught more than they bargained for.

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: Mr. Bean wants to learn skateboarding but hurts himself on his first try. Meanwhile Miss Wince is showing off her new mobility scooter at Mrs. Wickets. Bean is entranced. / Mrs. Wicket becomes annoyingly inconsolable when Scrapper goes missing - calling for him at all hours of the day and night.
