programme.title: Templiruutlite kadunud jaanused
programme.desc: Natside roovsaak, Vana-Rooma mundid, viikingite esemed, Hispaania kuld - need on vaid mõned hindamatud aarded, mis liiguvad pidevalt labi maailma kõige tegusamate ent taiesti tundmatute aardekuttide, Hamilton Whitei ja Carl Cooksoni kate.

programme.title: Battles BC
programme.desc: Step back in time and revisit some of the most brutal battles that took place before Christ. Recreated with stunning technology, we reveal these violent conflicts like never before, examining the soldiers, strategies and weapons deployed by the powerful legions. From Hannibals clashes with Rome to Alexander the Greats pursuits throughout India, these conflicts have had a resounding impact on our history and with these reconstructions you will see the ferocious aspects of war in antiquity.

programme.title: Lost Worlds
programme.desc: Documentary series that brings back to life lost cities, structures, cultures, and civilisations, transporting viewers back in time and revealing the truth behind some of historys most iconic eras. Using a combination of cutting-edge technology and archaeological research, the team detail what life was like for these places during their peak of their powers, and use visual overlays to compare past and present landscapes. From the Knights Templar to the lost city of Atlantis, ancient Egypt to Hitlers planned supercity, and ancient Athens to Americas wild west, each episodes dives into these extraordinary remnants of human history.

programme.title: Kuidas sunnivad katastroofid
programme.desc: Engineering has built our modern world. Everything from skyscrapers to roads and air travel are here because of Engineering. But what happens when engineering goes horribly wrong? Engineering Disasters goes beyond the headlines to uncover what really happened in the most notorious engineering accidents. What caused an outdoor stage to collapse in Indiana, killing seven? How did a collection of classic Corvettes disappear right out of thin air? Why did a planes fuselage rip open in mid-flight? What was behind the collapse of a domed stadium? Each hour long episode combines expert and eyewitness interviews, state of the art graphics, and dramatic "moment of disaster" footage to tell the story behind the worlds most terrifying engineering disasters.

programme.title: Secret History of Humans
programme.sub-title: Eat It, Drink It, Smoke It
programme.desc: Using dramatic reconstructions, this fascinating documentary series explores the evolution and advancement of the human race, dissecting the key events and changes that have affected and altered various civilisations. Each episode in this 12-part series focusses on a unique transformation of our ancestors, as they discovered more and more about the planet they inhabit. With expert historians offering explanations to these changes, the series reveals how powerful forces of nature compelled humans to adapt, the birth of war, the discovery of fire and metals, and the building of giant structures, among many others.

programme.title: Secret History of Humans
programme.desc: Using dramatic reconstructions, this fascinating documentary series explores the evolution and advancement of the human race, dissecting the key events and changes that have affected and altered various civilisations. Each episode in this 12-part series focusses on a unique transformation of our ancestors, as they discovered more and more about the planet they inhabit. With expert historians offering explanations to these changes, the series reveals how powerful forces of nature compelled humans to adapt, the birth of war, the discovery of fire and metals, and the building of giant structures, among many others.

programme.title: Muistse aja top 10
programme.desc: Ancient Top 10 is smart, fun countdown that details how ancient technology worked, how surprisingly advanced it was, and how it was kind of awesome. Location shooting, CGI, and graphics are pulled from past History series Ancient Impossible and Ancient Discoveries, and lists are organized by themes. The stories are augmented by new entries fueled by the History archive. Episodes include updated "Top Ten" graphics and new interviews that provide "wow" facts and explain why something made the list. The lists will have organizing principles so it doesnt seem arbitrary. Episodes could include the following: Top 10 Secrets of Egypt, Top 10 Ancient Vikings, Top 10 Greek Inventions, Top 10 Ancient Weapons, Top 10 Ancient Monuments, Top 10 Ancient Ships, Top 10 Torture Devices, Top 10 Roman Inventions, Top 10 Ancient Swords, and Top 10 Ancient Sieges.

programme.title: The Art of Washoku
programme.desc: Journey into the heart of Japans culinary heritage with this one-hour program celebrating the beauty and artistry of washoku—Japanese cuisine.

programme.title: Gold Hunters
programme.desc: Reality show that follows a group of modern day treasure hunters who search for the Lost Dutchman mine in the Superstition mountain range of Arizona. The promise of a $200 million has lured thousands of treasure hunters for years. Hunting for the Lost Dutchman is typically a one-man journey, but lifelong seeker Wayne Tuttle is breaking tradition and partnering with a team of experts to follow a newly revealed clue that could finally solve the 500-year-old mystery of Americas most famous and deadliest buried treasure. They will encounter many real life dangers on their adventure, leaving you on the edge of your seats in each episode.

programme.title: Templiruutlite piraadiaare
programme.desc: Scott follows the trail of the Knights Templar to Portugal, where he learns some stunning new information that breaks the investigation wide open. Barry focuses on a wreck he believes is Captain Kidds warship and makes a groundbreaking discovery.

programme.title: Battles BC
programme.desc: Step back in time and revisit some of the most brutal battles that took place before Christ. Hunting for the Lost Dutchman is typically a one-man journey, but lifelong seeker Wayne Tuttle is breaking tradition and partnering with a team of experts to follow a newly revealed clue that could finally solve the 500-year-old mystery of Americas most famous and deadliest buried treasure. They will encounter many real life dangers on their adventure, leaving you on the edge of your seats in each episode.

programme.title: Templiruutlite piraadiaare
programme.desc: Scott follows the trail of the Knights Templar to Portugal, where he learns some stunning new information that breaks the investigation wide open. Barry focuses on a wreck he believes is Captain Kidds warship and makes a groundbreaking discovery.

programme.title: Battles BC
programme.desc: Step back in time and revisit some of the most brutal battles that took place before Christ. Recreated with stunning technology, we reveal these violent conflicts like never before, examining the soldiers, strategies and weapons deployed by the powerful legions. From Hannibals clashes with Rome to Alexander the Greats pursuits throughout India, these conflicts have had a resounding impact on our history and with these reconstructions you will see the ferocious aspects of war in antiquity.

programme.title: Lost Worlds
programme.desc: Documentary series that brings back to life lost cities, structures, cultures, and civilisations, transporting viewers back in time and revealing the truth behind some of historys most iconic eras. Using a combination of cutting-edge technology and archaeological research, the team detail what life was like for these places during their peak of their powers, and use visual overlays to compare past and present landscapes. From the Knights Templar to the lost city of Atlantis, ancient Egypt to Hitlers planned supercity, and ancient Athens to Americas wild west, each episodes dives into these extraordinary remnants of human history.

programme.title: Kuidas sunnivad katastroofid
programme.desc: Engineering has built our modern world. Everything from skyscrapers to roads and air travel are here because of Engineering. But what happens when engineering goes horribly wrong? Engineering Disasters goes beyond the headlines to uncover what really happened in the most notorious engineering accidents. What caused an outdoor stage to collapse in Indiana, killing seven? How did a collection of classic Corvettes disappear right out of thin air? Why did a planes fuselage rip open in mid-flight? What was behind the collapse of a domed stadium? Each hour long episode combines expert and eyewitness interviews, state of the art graphics, and dramatic "moment of disaster" footage to tell the story behind the worlds most terrifying engineering disasters.

programme.title: Milky Chance - Garorock Festival
programme.desc: The German duet is back and better than ever! Milky Chance is the success story of two school friends, Clemens Rehbein and Philipp Dausch. After a long break, 2017 marks the release of a second, long-waited, album ""Blossom"". And, for the public, finally the occasion to discover live these new compositions, mixing rock, folk and electro pop. With reggae vibrations that can rub shoulders with house elements, Milky Chance has one of the most singular sounds. With the presence of musicians on stage, and if we believe the listening of the new record, we can expect more electric concerts, more electronic and even more energetic than in the past!

programme.title: Ziggy Marley - Live at the Filmore
programme.desc: The Fillmore Auditorium is a historic concert hall in San Francisco, California. Founded by Bill Graham, it was named after being located originally on the corners of Fillmore Street and Geary Boulevard.

programme.title: Justin Timberlake _ Live in London
programme.desc: Filmed at Roundhouse, London, this concert film will give all fans a spectacular Live experience from start to finish. Classic Justin Timberlake featuring unforgettable version of his hits: Sexyback, Cry Me a River, Suit and tie and many more.

programme.title: iConcerts Hits
programme.desc: A selection of our best concert previews and exclusive interviews.

programme.title: Motley Crue _ The End
programme.sub-title: Motley Crue _ The End: Live In Los Angeles
programme.desc: On January 28, 2014, Motley Crue held a press conference at Beachers Madhouse Theater in Hollywood, where they announced a final tour. The band became the first to sign a binding legal document known as a "cessation of touring" contract, preventing them from touring under the name Motley Crue past the year 2015. The tour eventually ended with three nights at the Staples Center in the bands hometown of Los Angeles on December 28, 30 and 31st of 2015. The visually stunning and final concert of Motley Crues final tour, Motley Crue: The End was captured with 30 cameras in Ultra HD 4K in front of a sold out crowd of die hard Motley Crue fans. For all of the legion of fans who were not able to experience the final concert of one of the greatest rock bands of all time, this is the ultimate chance to see the show and relive the final tour of Motley Crue.

programme.title: Bastille - Reading and Leeds Festival
programme.desc: The Reading and Leeds Festivals are a pair of annual music festivals that take place in Reading and Leeds, England. The events both happen on the bank holiday weekend in August (on Friday, Saturday, Sunday), and share the same bill (occasionally with one or two exceptions). The festivals origins date to the Beaulieu Jazz Festival (1956-1961) which became the National Jazz Festival in 1961 (The National Jazz and Blues Festival in 1963) and settled in Reading in 1971. In 1999 a second leg was added at Leeds. Featuring : Bastille.

programme.title: The Kills - Live at Coachella
programme.desc: The Coachella Valley Music and Arts Festival is an annual music and arts festival held at the Empire Polo Club in Indios Coachella Valley, California.

programme.title: Paul Simon - Live in New York City
programme.desc: During the first leg of Paul Simons triumphant, 2011 U.S. tour, he thrilled hometown fans with a special club performance at New York Citys historic Webster Hall. The show presents this iconic artist working at the peak of his artistic and creative powers in an unusually intimate setting. The 20-song, 90-minute set list was drawn from his legendary career and includes several songs that havent been performed live in many years. "Kodachrome," "Mother and Child Reunion," "Gone At Last" and "The Obvious Child" are just some of the highlights as well as songs from Simons most recent album, 2011s So Beautiful or So What (Hear Music/Concord Music Group) including "Dazzling Blue," "Rewrite," "The Afterlife" and the albums propulsive title track.

programme.title: Paul McCartney
programme.desc: On February 10, 2012, Sir Paul McCartney was honored as the 2012 MusiCares® Person of the Year. At a gala event in Los Angeles, Paul and a cast of superstar guests performed some of the quintessential songs from his renowned and celebrated career. Proceeds from the sale of this product will provide essential support for MusiCares, which ensures that music people have a place to turn in times of financial, medical and personal need.

programme.title: Take That - Wonderland Live From the O2
programme.desc: Celebrating the release of their eighth studio album Wonderland, Take That invite you to experience their sensational 2017 concert.

programme.title: Rod Stewart _ Live at Hyde Park
programme.desc: On a sunny day in September 2015, Rod Stewart took to the stage in Londons Hyde Park to bring to a close BBC Radio 2s annual Festival in a Day. In front of 50,000 people, Rod delivered not his usual stadium set but a bespoke selection of hits from his back catalogue spanning his career, including Gasoline Alley, Angel, In a Broken Dream and The Killing of Georgie (Part 1 and 2), plus Faces classics such as Ooh La La and the blues standard Rollin and Tumblin, a number that Rod used to perform with Long John Baldry back in the day. To close the set, Rod brought on his old pal guitarist Jim Cregan to help him perform his 1978 hit I Was Only Joking. All in all, a memorable and unique concert that is unlikely to be repeated anytime soon.

programme.title: The day the Rock Star Died
programme.desc: John Denver, began his music career with folk music groups during the late 1960s. Starting in the 1970s, he was one of the most popular acoustic artists of the decade and one of its best-selling artists. By 1974, he was firmly established as one of Americas best-selling performers, often described as ""among the most beloved entertainers of his era. Recording and releasing approximately 300 songs, with total sales of over 33 million records worldwide with his lyrics reflecting his joy in nature and disdain for city life, his enthusiasm for music, and his relationship trials. Denver, who was an avid pilot, died at the age of 53 flying his personal Canard aircraft in a single-fatality crash.

programme.title: Lady Gaga _ Live in London
programme.desc: Lady Gagas performance at the iTunes Festival in London on September 1, 2013 marks the superstars first full concert since the The Born This Way Ball. It is an eight song set containing the world premiere of seven tracks from her fourth album, ARTPOP: "Aura"; "MANiCURE"; "Artpop"; "Jewels N Drugs" ft. T.I., Too $hort and Twista; "Sexxx Dreams", "Swine"; and "I Wanna Be With You", a song that transformed into "Dope" for ARTPOP. During the concert, captured stunningly in HD, Gaga says that shes "a bit like Dorothy right now." The stage is her Kansas, the crowd is her family, and their reunion is pure magic. Lady Gaga, her dancers, and her band traverse through visual and musical themes of love, sex, violence, beauty, danger, empowerment, hustle, lust, and above all ART. Throughout, Gaga lays her heart bare for the audience and the cameras with every note sung and every word spoken.

programme.title: Dream Theater - Live at Luna Park
programme.desc: Dream Theater began their mammoth "A Dramatic Tour Of Events" world trek in July 2011 with the final leg in South America taking place in August 2012. This film is taken from their two nights at the Luna Park arena in Buenos Aires, Argentina. It was Dream Theaters first tour with new drummer Mike Mangini and many of the tracks from their first album together "A Dramatic Turn Of Events" are included. Dream Theater is rocks supreme virtuosos with many awards to their name and here in concert they bring all the power and drama of their music to life with breathtaking performances of classic tracks from across their career.

programme.title: Guns N Roses - Live From the O2 Arena London

programme.desc: Ben Howard works through a dramatic set in Austin TX, starting humble and concluding in a cataclysmic storm of drums, snapping guitar strings, and a delirious crowd taking it all in.

programme.title: Kurjus elab siin
programme.sub-title: Mom Lured Me Into A Trap
programme.desc: Based on real life events. Evil Lives Here is a true crime story show that speaks to family members of well-known murderers and criminals. It includes re-enactments, police footage, family photographs and videos that gives you the view through the murderers eyes. The programme is also styled to make you imagine it in the eyes of a loved one that you know. It is an in-depth investigation into the criminals life and the life of the family after the crime. It also looks into possible reasons why the criminal committed the crime without placing a viewpoint.

programme.title: The Curious Case of Natalia Grace
programme.sub-title: Age, Rage and The Big Lie
programme.desc: Natalia attempts to fill the missing pieces of her life by learning the truth about her age; shocking new information reveals that the Barnetts knew more about Natalia when they adopted her than they ever let on.

programme.title: The Curious Case of Natalia Grace
programme.desc: In an explosive confrontation, Natalia demands answers from Michael about their reasons for adopting her. Law enforcement officials speak out.

programme.title: To Catch a Killer
programme.desc: To catch a killer, you have to think like a killer. In this true-crime documentary series, a team of dedicated experts led by detective Mike Arntfield attempt to solve murder cases that have gone cold, bringing closure to victims families. By re-enacting the crimes, uncovering new evidence, talking with friends and family members, and using 21st century technology, the team of passionate investigators hunt down every lead in order to solve the case.

programme.title: The Interrogator
programme.desc: True-crime documentary series in which retired Houston Detective Fil Waters, known as the legendary Interrogator, as he has throughout his law enforcement career been able to maintain one of the top case closure rates in the county at over 95%, revisits some of his most shocking and famous cases. Using a combination of re-enactments, interviews, and actual interrogation footage, viewers get to go inside the gripping cases Detective Waters solved, as he reveals how he has gotten some unexpected criminals to come clean.

programme.title: People Magazine uurib
programme.desc: Crime documentary series. Since first hitting the newsstands in 1974, People Magazine has been intriguing millions of readers with their gripping human-interest stories. This series digs deeper into some of the publications most gripping true-life tales. We hear from people directly involved in these dramatic, shocking and sorrowful stories that gained widespread notoriety. People Magazine Investigates shares the twists and turns as the story unfolded to reach its ultimate conclusion.

programme.title: Undercover Underage

programme.title: The 1980s
programme.desc: Although the 1980s is one of the most fondly remembered decades, it was also a deadly one. This nostalgic crime documentary series looks beyond the big hair, bright and bold make-up, leg-warmers, electronic pop music, yuppie culture and classic movies. This series delves in the sinister side of the decade, revealing some of the more shocking events that took place at this time. Real-life murders are re-enacted. Whilst investigators are still grappling with questions about these horrific crimes after all these years. Shocking tales from all over the USA, from the death of a teenage cheerleader in California to mass murder in Missouri and homicide amongst New Yorks elite - this series may make you think differently about 1980 forever.

programme.title: Deadly Recall
programme.desc: True crime documentary series. For homicide detective Pat Postiglione forgetting his past isnt possible. Both burdening and benefitting, his photographic memory allows him to recall some of his most harrowing cases in extraordinary detail. Not only does his memory serve him well, but also Nashvilles homicide department, as he has become one of their most dependable detectives. Join Tennessees finest detective as takes a trip down memory lane to relive and retell gruesome and terrifying cases from his impressive 25 year career in homicide.

programme.title: Enquetes criminelles
programme.desc: Murders dont solve themselves. They require intricate investigating by determined individuals, those willing to go the extra mile to uncover new evidence and hunt down new leads. This true-crime documentary series explores the accomplishments of detectives in Atlantas Homicide Unit and prosecutors from the Fulton County District Attorneys Office, who solve bizarre and brutal crimes, and ensure the guilty are sentenced.

programme.title: Tõelised kuriteod Aphrodite Jonesiga
programme.desc: Crime documentary series hosted by Aphrodite Jones who looks into real-life crimes including some of the most atrocious murders of recent times. Jones shares details of these gruesome crimes alongside authentic footage, evidence and interviews with people associated to the case – sometimes even the perpetrator themselves. Subjects featured in the series include such high-profile cases as O. J. Simpson, Michael Jackson, the notorious Zodiac serial killer and the music producer Phil Spector. Jones attempts to get inside the minds of her subjects to better understand their motives for committing such unspeakable crimes. Aphrodite Jones is a true-crime expert, a former crime reporter for FOX News and the author of eight books.

It includes re-enactments, police footage, family photographs and videos that gives you the view through the murderers eyes. The programme is also styled to make you imagine it in the eyes of a loved one that you know. It is an in-depth investigation into the criminals life and the life of the family after the crime. It also looks into possible reasons why the criminal committed the crime without placing a viewpoint.

programme.title: Death by Fame
programme.desc: The son of a powerful Hollywood player yearns to escape his dads shadow. Dark secrets come to light when a human torso turns up in a dumpster.

programme.title: Obsession
programme.desc: Crime documentary series that features terrifying real-life stories of people who have been the victims of stalkers. In the beginning, a persistent suitor, new friend, or nosy neighbor may seem harmless, but soon they can form an obsession and refuse to let go, often creating a fantasy world in which friendship isnt enough. Victims will have to fight to protect themselves and their families from an obsessive person who starts to torment them.

programme.title: Tõelised kuriteod Aphrodite Jonesiga
programme.desc: Crime documentary series hosted by Aphrodite Jones who looks into real-life crimes including some of the most atrocious murders of recent times. Jones shares details of these gruesome crimes alongside authentic footage, evidence and interviews with people associated to the case – sometimes even the perpetrator themselves. Subjects featured in the series include such high-profile cases as O. J. Simpson, Michael Jackson, the notorious Zodiac serial killer and the music producer Phil Spector. Jones attempts to get inside the minds of her subjects to better understand their motives for committing such unspeakable crimes. Aphrodite Jones is a true-crime expert, a former crime reporter for FOX News and the author of eight books.

programme.title: The 1980s
programme.desc: Although the 1980s is one of the most fondly remembered decades, it was also a deadly one. This nostalgic crime documentary series looks beyond the big hair, bright and bold make-up, leg-warmers, electronic pop music, yuppie culture and classic movies. This series delves in the sinister side of the decade, revealing some of the more shocking events that took place at this time. Real-life murders are re-enacted. Whilst investigators are still grappling with questions about these horrific crimes after all these years. Shocking tales from all over the USA, from the death of a teenage cheerleader in California to mass murder in Missouri and homicide amongst New Yorks elite - this series may make you think differently about 1980 forever.

programme.title: Married To Evil
programme.desc: A figure dressed as a clown shoots a mother on her doorstep. The case goes cold until an unexpected break helps bring the killer clown to justice.

programme.title: Married To Evil
programme.sub-title: Home Is Where the Nightmare Is
programme.desc: A woman plans to leave her controlling and violent husband. But when he finds out, hell do anything to stop her and concocts a devious plot.

programme.title: True Conviction
programme.desc: True Conviction crime series is based on homicide cases from real life. The series explores how these cases are solved on the street and won in the courtroom. It is hosted by Anna-Sigga Nicolazzi, a decorated Brooklyn prosecutor who has never lost a murder case. She travels across the country to check how the nations top prosecutors handle their toughest cases and meets with other key figures in the cases, including loved ones and investigators.

programme.title: True Conviction
programme.desc: True Conviction crime series is based on homicide cases from real life. The series explores how these cases are solved on the street and won in the courtroom. She travels across the country to check how the nations top prosecutors handle their toughest cases and meets with other key figures in the cases, including loved ones and investigators.

programme.title: The Lies That Bind
programme.desc: A true-crime series that exposes the sinister secrets and dark betrayals that are often involved in heinous crimes of murder. Sometimes the secret or lie can appear innocent at first but they are soon revealed to have life-altering consequences. Or the indiscretion or flasehood can be deliberately misleading in order to protect the guilty. Investigators have to determine which witness accounts are true and which are false or deceitful. Episodes include stories such as when Louisiana Melton and her boyfriend Phillip Brown are found shot dead and the investigating officer uncovers a huge lie that sheds light on the crime; or when Lisa Moore goes missing shortly after ending her marriage and her family fear the worst; or when a pastors wife is killed when the parsonage is burned down and the fire marshall uncovers a damaging secret.

programme.title: A Body in the Basement
programme.desc: When 32-year-old Adam Chase disappears in Ontario County, NY, it takes the tireless efforts of a private investigator to reveal the truth - and Adams tragic fate.

programme.title: A Body in the Basement
programme.desc: A man vanishes from a small Idaho town, leaving a trail of strange clues and rumours. When his body is found, the truth is more shocking than anyone imagined.

programme.title: Ameerika monstrum
programme.desc: Serial killers hiding in plain sight and murderers living perfect family life. American Monster reveals the truth behind some of the most shocking crimes thats happened around the country. Through dramatization and never-seen-before footage, each case shows you that anyone can be a monster, but it also allows us to understand how they became monsters. Through testimonies of family members and friends, along with home videos showing them at their most innocent, this true-crime drama gives us a closer look at the double life of some of the most ruthless monster in American history.

programme.title: Kadunud
programme.sub-title: The Most Hated Woman in America
programme.desc: Disappeared is an American documentary TV show that contains dramatic re-enactments and interviews with law enforcement officers, investigators, and relatives connected with cases in which individuals have gone missing without a trace. The stories are heartbreaking and unbelievable, the families of people who have gone missing never give up hope. Some cases have tragic endings, some are heartwarming, but most of them are still open which makes the agony of the families go on.

programme.title: Kadunud

programme.title: Married with Secrets
programme.desc: This drama series takes a look into true crime stories, and investigates incidences of a spouse secretly committing crime under the nose of their other half. This program shows reenactments and dramatised versions of the events that have been unfolded when one partners intentions turnns into a sinister. Men and women in these cases take unexpectedly dark paths with devastating results in return whilst deceiving their devoted partners.

programme.title: Married with Secrets

programme.title: The Dead Files
programme.desc: The American paranormal television series focuses on investigations by retired homicide detective Steve DiSchiavi and psychic communicator Amy Allan. The two never communicate during investigation, they study the cases of crimes separately, and only coming to certain conclusions compare their results. Their methods of work are completely opposite: Steve uses common sense, documents, talks to real people, and Amy relies on her sixth sense and her ability to communicate with ghosts and spirits.

programme.title: Help! My House Is Haunted
programme.desc: Created by Ghost Adventures Zak Bagans, star of the popular US paranormal show, Help My House Is Haunted is a ghost-hunting series where paranormal investigators search for paranormal entities. Some familiar faces like Barri Ghai, founder of The Ghostfinder Paranormal Society and and the shows investigator and paranormal tech expert, as well as world renowned psychic Chris Fleming join Jayne Harris, Paranormal Researcher. They travel the UK and visit houses and petrified families troubled by hauntings, and using the latest technology try to capture never before seen proof of the paranormal.

programme.title: Help! My House Is Haunted
programme.sub-title: Rising Souls of the Rising Sun
programme.desc: Created by Ghost Adventures Zak Bagans, star of the popular US paranormal show, Help My House Is Haunted is a ghost-hunting series where paranormal investigators search for paranormal entities. programme.title: Destination Fear
programme.desc: This paranormal reality series follows explorer and ghost hunter Dakota Laden who partners up his sister Chelsea and best friend Tanner, to travel across the country in an RV and visit the most haunted locations in America -dark corridors of Brushy Mountain State Penitentiary, notorious Eloise Psychiatric Hospital, terrifying St. Albans Sanatorium and many more, as they learn the blood-chilling stories behind this scary places and face their darkest fears.
